changeSet.author: typography
changeSet.createView:
SELECT mm.movement_date TRANSACTION_DATE, mm.amount MONEY_AMOUNT, 'ручная проводка' TRANSACTION_TYPE, '' SUMMARY, NULL ITEMS_AMOUNT, mm.user_id USER_ID FROM money_movements mm
union
SELECT o.order_date, o.money_received, 'продажа', o.order_subject_name, o.amount, o.user_id FROM order_with_subject_with_consumables_view o
union
SELECT pc.purchasing_date, -(pc.amount * pc.price), 'закупка', ci.item, pc.amount, pc.user_id FROM purchasing_consumables pc left join consumable_items ci on pc.consumable_id = ci.id
